title: Environmental Literacy Enhancement Through Virtual Ecosystem Exploration

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Environmental Concepts and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: An environmental education program for working professionals, providing immersive learning experiences through virtual reality (VR) technology

learning_goals: Learners can analyze species interactions (predation, reproduction, etc.) in a virtual ecosystem simulation and propose solutions for real-world environmental issues.
Learners can design at least three sustainability strategies for urban ecosystems through game-based learning scenarios.
Learners can complete over 80% of the process for investigating → analyzing → and planning actionable solutions for environmental problems while performing situational learning tasks.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
